items.sentence: I speak French a little, but I\'m not good at it yet.
I still haven\'t found what Tom asked me to look for.
It was hard to figure out what Tom was trying to say.
It was lucky that we got the tickets for the concert.
I bet I\'m not the only one who knows how to do this.
Don\'t think this kind of thing can\'t happen to you.
How did you find out that Tom hadn\'t paid his bills?
How do you know Tom didn\'t eat before you got there?
How do you know the police don\'t know what happened?
Tom was shocked when I told him what I planned to do.
Tom was shocked when I told him what Mary had bought.
Tom was sitting at a table near the window with Mary.
Tom was supposed to go to school with Mary yesterday.
Tom was surprised how well Mary could play ping pong.
My mother bought my little brother a yellow umbrella.
My mother goes to the market every day to buy things.
My mother told me why my father was so angry with me.
My sister expects to graduate from college next year.
If I had known her address, I could have visited her.
If I knew her name and address, I could write to her.
